name: Julia Furst Morgado
tagline: Principal Developer Relations Engineer at Dash0, CNCF Ambassador, and AWS Container Hero specializing in OpenTelemetry and observability
bio: Julia Furst Morgado is a Principal Developer Relations Engineer at Dash0, focusing on OpenTelemetry and observability. A CNCF Ambassador, AWS Container Hero, and Docker Captain, she translates complex cloud-native concepts into actionable practices.
